original_title: The Quest for Tom Sawyer's Gold
overview: Agatha Armstrong and her trusty sidekick Mrs. Mac were once the worldâ€™s most daring adventurers. But when her son Ant came along, everything quickly changed and her devil-may-care ways took a backseat to being over-protective and terrified of anything that posed a risk to her family.
tagline: The enigma of the lost treasure.
title: The Quest for Tom Sawyer's Gold
